ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Abandoned'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'voided')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'voided')) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not change Status From voided to Abandoned or Confirm.
